snippet: The Film Society of Lincoln Center is giving its annual Chaplin Award to Barbra Streisand, citing in particular her roles as the writer, director, producer and star of "Yentl."
abstract: The Film Society of Lincoln Center is giving its annual Chaplin Award to Barbra Streisand, citing in particular her roles as the writer, director, producer and star of "Yentl."

headline.main: Streisand to Receive Film Society Honor
headline.print_headline: Film Society of Lincoln Center Plans To Honor Streisand
